item.title: Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 – Still No Answers
item.description: Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 remains one of the greatest aviation mysteries in modern history. Despite extensive searches, countless theories, and global investigations, the fate of the 239 passengers and crew on board the Boeing 777 remains unknown. How could a modern aircraft disappear without a trace, and why has it remained unsolved for nearly a decade? The Disappearance On March 8, 2014,
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Vimanas in Ancient India – Were They Real Flying Machines?
item.description: The idea of Vimanas, ancient flying machines mentioned in Indian scriptures, has fascinated historians, scientists, and enthusiasts alike. Some believe these texts describe advanced aerial technology far ahead of their time, while others argue that Vimanas are purely mythological. But could ancient India have actually possessed flying technology, or are these references symbolic? Let’s explo
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
